channel.title: Laurier Brantford on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition

item.title: Wilfrid Laurier Brantford Campus Walkout: March 20th at Noon
item.description: Join Students Against Ford Cuts and others at the Wilfrid Laurier University – Brantford Campus in a peaceful protest of the OSAP cuts and, so-called, student choice initiative. Rally and speakers in the March 20 12pm-1pm David Fuels Walkway Facebook event Show your support by pinning a red square to your clothes! Speakers TBA.
